# 下拉框

[ { "title": "苹果", "value": "0" } ]

  • 苹果
  • 橘子
  • 香蕉 
    <template>
        <p>{{selectedValue}}</p>   
        <div>
            <Selection :list-data="listData" v-model="selectedValue" />
        </div>   
    </template>
    <script>
        export default {
            name: 'SomeComponent',
            data(){
                return {
                    listData: [
                        {title: '苹果', value: '0'},
                        {title: '橘子', value: '1'},
                        {title: '香蕉', value: '2'},
                    ],
                    selectedValue: [{title: '苹果', value: '0'}],
                }
            }
        }
    </script>
